title: Bedroom

properties.name: description
properties.value: A bedroom can be made in a player-owned house using the Construction skill. Players must have at least level 20 Construction to be able to make a bedroom. To hire a servant, there must be at least two bedrooms with beds within the player's house. It costs 10,000 coins to build.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Bedroom
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
Bedroom
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Icon
Construction level20
Cost10,000
Door layout
Bedroom

A bedroom can be made in a player-owned house using the Construction skill. Players must have at least level 20 Construction to be able to make a bedroom. To hire a servant, there must be at least two bedrooms with beds within the player's house. It costs 10,000 coins to build.

There are seven different types of hotspot the player can build on:

  • Bed space
  • Corner space
  • Curtain space
  • Dresser space
  • Fireplace space
  • Rug space
  • Wardrobe space

The bedroom has 2 non-parallel doors. This makes it an efficient corner room.

Contents

  • 1 Bed
  • 2 Corner
  • 3 Curtains
  • 4 Dresser
  • 5 Fireplace
  • 6 Rug
  • 7 Wardrobe

Dresser[edit | edit source]

The dresser allows the player to change hair styles and colour. Higher grades offer more styles and colours to choose from.

Wardrobe[edit | edit source]

The wardrobe allows the player to change their basic clothing and shoes. Higher grades offer more options to choose from.
